speaker.whotheyare: Dylan Marron takes complicated social issues and finds accessible ways to talk about them through interviews, short-form videos and satire.
speaker.whylisten: Dylan Marron is the host and creator of Conversations with People Who Hate Me, the award-winning podcast that connects adversarial strangers on phone calls. His book, also titled Conversations with People Who Hate Me, was published on March 29, 2022 by Atria, a division of Simon & Schuster. The Associated Press called the book "a fascinating meditation on human connection and on finding common ground with people you never thought possible." His TED Talk, "Empathy is not endorsement," has been viewed millions of time worldwide. Marron recently joined the writing staff of the Emmy-winning Apple TV+ series Ted Lasso.
